channel.title: Guild Miner Extreme
channel.description:
I would be willing to pay alot of money to someone who could make a good solid Guild Miner, and include:
* a pick axe dent handler which goes to nurfor or whatever and fixes it with the money in your bank * and or, takes out a new rune pickaxe when the other one gets broken/dented
